title: section 2 (1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Housing, Local Government and 

Heritage (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited housing local government heritage (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024

title: section 2 (1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage conferred on him - 

(a) 

by or under the provisions of the enactments specified in Part 1 
of the Schedule, 

(b) by or under the enactments specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

and 

(c) 

under the instruments specified in Part 3 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Alan Dillon, Minister of State at the Department of Housing, 
Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [234] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister housing local government heritage conferred - (a) provision enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) enactment specified part 2 schedule (c) instrument specified part 3 schedule delegated alan dillon minister state department housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 24th may 2024 234 3

title: section 2 (1) of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977
heading: Sections 5 and 6 of the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1979 (No. 27
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Sections 5 and 6 of the Housing (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 1979 (No. 27 
of 1979) 

Sections 28 to 34 of the Local Government Act 1991 (No. 11 of 1991) 

Section 6 of the Local Government Act 1998 (No. 16 of 1998) 

Sections 53(8) and 56 of the Valuation Act 2001 (No. 13 of 2001) 

The following sections of the Local Government Act 2001 (No. 37 of 2001): 

22A, 23, 44, 48, 51, 52, 54, 68, 75, 87, 96, 102, 103, 103A, 104, 106, 107, 108, 
111, 115 to 118, 120 to 123, 125, 126, 126C, 126D, 126K, 128, 129C, 129G, 
131, 131A, 133, 134, 134A, 136, 142 to 148, 151, 156, 158, 160, 161, 162, 
167, 169, 171, 174 to 176, 183, 189, 190, 192, 199 to 201, in so far as the 
references to appropriate Minister in those sections relate to the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage, 206, 210, 221 to 223, 225, 231, 233, 
and 237A 

Sections 8 and 28(1) of the Harbours Act 2015 (No. 61 of 2015) 

Sections 6, 9, 11, 15, 18, and 28 of the Local Government Rates and other 
Matters Act 2019 (No. 24 of 2019) 

Sections 60 and 61 of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 30 of 2022) 

Sections 7, 8, 15, 16, 19, 30, 47(1) and (6) and 52 of the Local Government 
(Mayor of Limerick) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2024 (No. 7 of 2024) 

PART 2 

Building Control Acts 1990 to 2020 

Derelict Sites Act 1990 

Urban Renewal Act 1998 (No. 27 of 1998), other than Part III 

Housing (Traveller Accommodation) Act 1998 (No. 33 of 1998) 

Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2023 (No. 30 of 2000), other than 
Chapter 1 of Part VI 

Licensing of Indoor Events Act 2003 (No. 15 of 2003) 

Pyrite Resolution Act 2013 (No. 51 of 2013), other than sections 10 and 11 

Local Government Act 2019 (No. 1 of 2019) 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [234] 

European Communities (Environmental Assessment of Certain Plans and 
Programmes) Regulations 2004 to 2011 

PART 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

21 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [234] 5

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
